goals.description: Finish Huntington Beach half-marathon (13.1 miles) in under two hours!
The ultimate goal is to power all Apple facilities entirely by renewable energy
By the end of the year, I want to have visited all 50 states and met people in each one.
Accelerate the advent of sustainable transport by bringing compelling mass market electric cars to market as soon as possible
I'd like to conquer the world by taking control of the internet and the stratosphere while I'm at it

comments.text: That's a great goal. Make sure you are hydrated throughout the run. I'm cheering you on!
